snippet: A range of experts say the economy should improve somewhat in the coming months because of lower oil prices and industries like autos and housing.
abstract: Broad range of experts and forecasters, despite the recent run of disappointing economic data, expect the economy to improve slightly in coming months, thanks to lower oil prices and new signs of life from sectors like automobiles and housing; pace of economic growth will have huge implications for a country still trying to emerge from the worst downturn in 70 years amid a presidential campaign that will most likely turn on the economy.
lead_paragraph: A range of experts say the economy should improve somewhat in the coming months because of lower oil prices and industries like autos and housing.

headline.main: In Latest Data on Economy, Experts See Signs of Pickup
headline.print_headline: In Latest Data, Economists See Signs of Pickup
